availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Francis Landon Cleveland (Augusta, Kentucky, attorney and politician)

body.p: Augusta, Kentucky, attorney and politician. Ohio native. Attorney in Augusta in 1860. Member of the House of Representatives of the Commonwealth of Kentucky. Member of the Senate of the Commonwealth of Kentucky.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bracken County, Augusta, p. 119; Interior Journal (Stanford, Ky.), August 26, 1881, p. 2; Find A Grave, "Francis Landon Cleveland (1823-1881)," Memorial #78908974, http://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=78908974&ref=acom (accessed March 8, 2017); U.S., Civil War Draft Registrations Records, 1863-1865 (Provost Marshal General's Bureau; Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865). NARA RG110, Records of the Provost Marshal Generalâ€™s Bureau (Civil War), Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registrations, 1863-1865 (Civil War Union Draft Records), Bracken County, KY, June/July 1863, p. 67, (Accessed via ancestry.com).
